name: 꽃미남 박지광세무사
prompt_block: Korean webtoon style illustration of a handsome young male character ('flower boy' aesthetic). He features short, textured dark hair with distinct high-contrast white glossy highlights. The face has fair skin, a sharp jawline, and expressive eyes, often accented with a soft, airbrushed blush on the cheeks and nose tip. The character is dressed in clean, casual contemporary fashion (beige cardigan, slate blue button-down, white undershirt). The art style utilizes crisp, variable-width black ink outlines and sharp cel-shading for shadows on the neck and clothing folds.
